goal.en:
“教學目標 Goal
Introduction of antenna fundamentals and antenna system in remote sensing, followed by a study of the properties of EM waves and their propagation mechanisms。The scattering from tenuous particles and energy transport theory with some remote sensing applications will be covered.“

1.1 Index and Direct Notations
1. A denotes a matrix. v and u present vectors, e.g. Av = u.
This form has several advantages. First, the symbols v, u, and A themselves, not their components, correspond to physical quantities. Secondly, direct notation records a physical statement which clearly shows the relationship among physical quantities. Thirdly, direct notation provides a natural way of describing a geometrical or physical quantity that is independent of coordinate systems. Finally, rules of operations on vectors and matrices may apply to the direct form to obtain solutions without resorting to components.
